page.title: 08DUNDEE - CROP IMPROVEMENT
page.content: The institute must be cost effective and redundancies are expected.The only restriction placed on the scientists is the work must relate to U.K. crops The research is concentrated on improving crop quality and the evaluation of control measures used against diseases and pests. Climatic and cultural factors and disorders of nutritional and physiological origin are also studied. Rabbits are the only animals used in experiments but many insects including aphids are used.At the moment there is no research on new crops for the U.K. but this has been done in the past e.g.lupins and oil seed rape.The Tayberry,a cross between a raspberry and a blackberry,was created at Mylnefield.
